sentence: Congressman Paul Gosar (R-AZ) recently shared with his constituents new photos and video of the latest surge of illegal aliens crossing the southern border in Yuma, Arizona.
author: Catherine Mortensen
title: Joe Biden’s Presidency: How It Started… How It’s Going

sentence: Rally organizer Ali Alexander previously alleged that Reps. Mo Brooks, R-Ala., Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., and Andy Biggs, R-Ariz., helped plan the march to the Capitol.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Jan. 6 DOJ probe expands to Trump “VIPs” — and maybe members of Congress: report
Jan. 6 Panel Has Evidence for Criminal Referral of Trump, but Splits on Sending

sentence: Far-right activist Ali Alexander went into hiding after the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, but he did publish a video in which he claimed he met with GOP lawmakers such as Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and Mo Brooks (R-AL) ahead of the riots.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: NY Times reporter asks why the Jan. 6 committee won't subpoena Mo Brooks and Paul Gosar
